website_summaries.verdict: An ideal option for anglers who want an ice fishing rod that provides fast action and a light tip.
pros: Constructed with a solid carbon blank and full cork handle for unparalleled quality
Features a 3+1 bearing system that ensures the rod will perform as expected, even in frigid temperatures
Designed for a variety of fishing techniques
cons: Small rod in comparison to similar options

customer_reviews.title: I used it a little over a dozen times during this last winter and it worked great. The tip is pretty sensitive so subtle bites ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ice-fishing rod I've owned so far and I have no complaints. I used it a little over a dozen times during this last winter and it worked great. The tip is pretty sensitive so subtle bites are easy to pick up on as long as you're paying attention. The only thing I'm unable to comment on is how it handles with larger fish such as Walleye or Northerns. I've only caught Rock Bass and Perch on it so far so it's limits have yet to be tested. Overall, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cos

customer_reviews.title: Pre Ice Review
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, great quality and look. Only problem was that the reel was sticking a bit. I tried breaking it in but it didn’t work. I was going to return it until I decided to clean it and hope for change. With a little TLC the reel was super smooth and the stick was gone completely. All I used was a little oil and some reel grease. The problem was fixed in less than ten minutes while I watched TV. Updates will come after I get safe ice...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ultralight ice combo!
customer_reviews.text: Great ultra light combo for panfish and small trout. Reel feels solid and has a long neck, perfect for the pencil grip. Smooth action and well made. Great flex while maintaining a stable base. Makes fighting the small fish more enjoyable. Really solid unit for the price. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: I love this rod very strong and very sensitive and the handle made of cork it fits very nice on your hand
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Frozen Gear Lube... possibly
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this pole. I bought the 25" light for panfishing and have had no complaints about the rod itself. Great sensitivity and action, but still has enough backbone for bass and pike. My one complaint (and this might be a fluke) is that the reel doesn't always reel smooth. It seems to me that the problem may be some frozen gear lube or maybe a lack of lube, I'm still not quite sure what the problem is but it doesn't effect the power of the reel, just makes it a little tougher to turn. All in all a great rod and reel combo for a great price would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin A. Glime

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rod and reel combo
customer_reviews.text: Bought for bream & crappie fishing. Awesome rod and reel combo. Makes fish feel huge and fun to fight. Bought for around $20 and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Bmurphy1

customer_reviews.title: This is a great "light" combo for panfish
customer_reviews.text: This is a great "light" combo for panfish. the rod is short and probably best utilized in fish houses but still works great even hole hopping. The reel is fantastic for a combo rod, i love the long neck on the rod makes pencil grip very easy. abu garcia did a great job on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One came in with tip broke second came in perfect shape
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2. One came in with tip broke second came in perfect shape
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice action
customer_reviews.text: This combo performed great for me on a cold day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C. Cusick

customer_reviews.title: could be 5 stars, will update
customer_reviews.text: I only chose 4 stars because I haven't had the chance to test it out yet. Although, by first impressions, this pole is solid. Awesome feel and awesome quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Listwak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sweet pole, small flexible strong,perfect for traveling.The reels pretty sweet too
customer_reviews.author: David gomez

customer_reviews.title: Bad mofo
customer_reviews.text: This is the sweetest ice fishing pole by far i ever owned love this bad girl
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Mine just came in, and it's came in broke. I don't know where things went wrong from their part. Also the guides are off t

customer_reviews.title: Packaged poorly.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these and one rod was broke when I received them.
